items.title: Nice zwaait trainer uit in aanloop naar treffen met Go Ahead en heeft al vervanger
items.summary: Franck Haise is niet langer de trainer van OGC Nice. Vlak voor de jaarwisseling is het contract tussen coach en club met wederzijds goedvinden ontbonden. Over enkele weken speelt Le Gym in de Europa League tegen Go Ahead Eagles.

items.title: Pogba wint award: 'Voor iedereen die in me geloofde toen het donker was'
items.summary: Paul Pogba is in de prijzen gevallen bij de Globe Soccer Awards. De Franse middenvelder won in de categorie Best Sporting Improvement. Zelf is hij de organisatie zeer erkentelijk.

items.title: Spelers FC Porto na kerst afgevallen door slim trucje: 'Hebben het goed gedaan'
items.summary: De spelers van FC Porto hebben zich goed gedragen tijdens het kerstdiner. Trainer Francesco Farioli zei van tevoren dat ze op gewicht terug moesten komen , maar sommige spelers waren zelfs afgevallen door een slim trucje.

items.title: Ronaldo won't retire until 1,000 career goals
items.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has reiterated his desire to reach 1,000 career goals before he calls time on his playing career.

items.title: Slot frustrated over injuries to Liverpool signings
items.summary: Liverpool have yet to get full value from their huge summer spending spree because of the injuries they have suffered, according to head coach Arne Slot.

items.title: Transfers PSV: Fulham wederom gelinkt aan PSV-spits Pepi
items.summary: Ook buiten de transferperiode om volgt VI het transfernieuws bij PSV op de voet, ook omdat het sneller dan je denkt alweer januari is. De doelwitten van de Eindhovenaren, duiding van de clubwatcher, of aandacht in buitenlandse media. We verzamelen alles hier.

items.title: Why Cherki's creativity has changed the title picture for Man City
WK in trek ondanks torenhoge ticketprijzen: Infantino pocht met historische cijfers
items.summary: Tickets voor het WK 2026 zijn in trek. FIFA-president Gianni Infantino heeft trots gemeld dat in de eerste vijftien dagen 150 miljoen aanvragen voor tickets zijn binnengekomen, van over de hele wereld. En dus was de bestuurder in opperbeste stemming.

items.title: Pulisic nets in Milan win, on pace for best campaign
items.summary: Christian Pulisic is on pace for the best season of his career -- in a season that will conclude with a home World Cup played in the United States.

items.title: Pep credits Club World Cup for lifting 'fog' at City
items.summary: Pep Guardiola said Manchester City's title bid was conceived at last summer's Club World Cup which helped clear the "fog" surrounding the club.

items.title: Ronaldo will not retire until he scores 1,000 goals
items.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo says he will not end his playing career until he scores his 1,000th career goal.

items.title: ‚ÄòWe should have pulled the Big Sam ripcord‚Äô: Premier League fans assess the season so far
items.summary: The Guardian‚Äôs fans‚Äô network on 2025-26 at the halfway stage: best games, worst setbacks, and their January window wish lists Story so far It would be pretty churlish to be anything other than super-chuffed, with those displays over Bayern Munich and our neighbours among the highlights. But, as we know, there are no prizes for being top at Christmas. Our success so far has largely been due to our defensive resilience; it‚Äôs the most talented squad we‚Äôve had in many a moon but we‚Äôve only shone going forward in fits and spurts. Find that spark on a consistent basis and we really will be firing. Bernard Azulay onlinegooner.com; @GoonerN5 Continue reading...

items.summary: Blink and you'll miss it - 'Champagne' Charlie Manby and 'Rapid' Ricky Evans are set to light up Alexandra Palace on Monday afternoon when two of the fastest players on planet darts clash in a match you won't want to miss!

items.title: Serie A roundup: Lautaro Mart√≠nez puts Inter back on top with winner at Atalanta
items.summary: Forward scores only goal of the game in 65th minute Milan had gone top earlier in day by beating Verona 3-0 Lautaro Mart√≠nez scored to give Inter an important 1-0 win at Atalanta on Sunday, sending his side into the new year at the top of Serie A. Inter lead a tightly contested league table on 36 points, one clear of Milan and two ahead of Napoli. Marcus Thuram appeared to have put Inter into the lead just before the interval, but the goal was ruled out after an offside by Mart√≠nez in the build-up. Atalanta felt a similar sense of frustration soon after the restart when Nicola Zalewski broke through one-on-one with Yann Sommer, only for the Inter goalkeeper to produce a spectacular leg save. Continue reading...

items.title: Energetic Manchester City have lifted last season‚Äôs fog, says Pep Guardiola
items.summary: City second after six straight Premier League wins ‚ÄòWe have to improve but this mindset is better‚Äô Pep Guardiola believes Manchester City have regained the energy that eluded them last season and lifted the ‚Äúfog‚Äù that clouded a disappointing campaign. City finished without a major trophy for the first time since 2016-17, Guardiola‚Äôs first in charge, but are hunting a seventh Premier League title under him after six straight wins. Rayan Cherki struck late on at Nottingham Forest on Saturday to maintain City‚Äôs impressive winning run, which extends to eight in all competitions. Second-placed City are two points behind leaders Arsenal, who host third-placed Aston Villa at the Emirates Stadium on Tuesday. City do not return to action until Thursday, when they face high-flying Sunderland at the Stadium of Light. Continue reading...

items.title: Afcon roundup: Mozambique stun Gabon to end 40-year wait for win
items.summary: Bangal, Catamo and Calila score in 3-2 victory Diallo on target as C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire draw with Cameroon Mozambique ended a 40-year wait for victory at the Africa Cup of Nations as they beat Gabon 3-2 in Agadir. Goals from Faisal Bangal, Geny Catamo and Diogo Calila earned the southern African side a deserved victory in which they were led by 42-year-old winger Elias Pelembe. It is their first win at the continental finals since their debut in 1986 in what was their 17th game. Continue reading...

items.title: Uncertainty and lack of form - Palace's 'flat' end to historic year
items.summary: After arguably the greatest year in the club's history, Crystal Palace will begin 2026 out of form and surrounded by an air of uncertainty.
